Today I announced our plan to prevent mass shootings & gun violence.The #StopSchoolViolenceAct innovated by @sandyhook is one of our key proposals. This is a very meaningful & effective proposal that has widespread support in both parties. Lets do it.

Action on gun violence is not a political question — it’s about keeping Americans safe. Here’s what we need to do to start addressing this epidemic:

✅ Make background checks universal 
✅ Ban assault weapons 
✅ Ban bump stocks 
✅ Raise the minimum age to purchase rifles
